metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45141 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Since the Windows Kerberos RC4-HMAC Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability was disclosed by Microsoft on Nov 8 2022 and per RFC8429 it is assumed that rc4-hmac is weak, Vulnerable Samba Active Directory DCs will issue rc4-hmac encrypted tickets despite the target server supporting better encryption (eg aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldb-tools - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
libldb2 - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
python3-ldb - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

ctdb - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
libnss-winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
libpam-winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
libsmbclient - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
libwbclient0 - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
python3-samba - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
registry-tools - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-common - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-common-bin - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-libs - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-testsuite - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
smbclient - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only affects 4.15.x and earlier The focal samba update was temporarily reverted by USN 5822-2 because it introduced regressions. It was later updated again with USN 5936-1.

criterions.comment: samba package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
